00028 Node::Node() {
00029         this->id = 0;
00030         this->attributes.clear();
00031         this->parents.clear();
00032 }
00033 
00034 Node::~Node() {
00035 
00036 }

00054 {
00055     this->id = id;

00057 
00058 void Node::addParent(Node* node)
00059 {
00060     parents.push_back(node);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Node::removeParent(Node* node)
00064 {
00065 
00066         std::vector<Node*>::iterator parentIterator = std::find(parents.begin(), parents.end(), node);
00067     if (parentIterator!=parents.end()) {
00068         parents.erase(parentIterator);
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 vector<Node*> Node::getParents() {
00073         return parents;
00074 }
00075 
00076 Node* Node::getParent(unsigned int index)  {
00077         if (index >= getNumberOfParents()) {
00078 //              throw std::out_of_range("Cannot get parent for this Node."); //FIXME
00079                 assert(false);
00080                 return 0;
00081         }
00082         return parents[index];
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 
00087 unsigned int Node::getNumberOfParents() const {
00088         return static_cast<unsigned int>(parents.size());
00089 }
00090 
00091 void Node::accept(INodeVisitor* visitor) {
00092         visitor->visit(this);
00093         if (visitor->getDirection() == INodeVisitor::upwards) {
00094             for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfParents(); ++i) // recursively go up the graph structure
00095             {
00096                 getParent(i)->accept(visitor);
00097             }
00098         }
00099 }
